scripts.dev: concurrently "cd client && npm i && npm run build" "cd server && npm i && npm run dev"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && rm -rf package-lock.json node_modules server/package-lock.json server/node_modules client/package-lock.json client/node_modules && npm install && npm install @rollup/rollup-linux-x64-gnu --save-optional && npm run build && cd ../server && npm ci
